{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3330711,"name":null,"username":"Yuri","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/yuri/{size}/218839_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-12T01:34:28.335Z","cooked":"

i have a roboRIO 2.0 that, when pressed the reset button, it corrupts the image of the RIO, and the status light keepts blinking.
this also happens when i have tried to change the number of the Roborio in the Roborio Imaging tool, because the last step is reboot the system. I dont know if this is a hardware problem, because i have changed the sd card multiple times and i haven’t find a way to stop this.

to change the number i have made some quastionable things :. i have turned off the power in the last step of configuration of the RIO to skip the reboot part. and then it had worked.

does someone have a idea of what is happening ?
